message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early.
A decent start, but I think I can do better. Your turn!
You're pushing me to the limit, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not budging much.
You're not budging much, huh? I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this. Your turn again!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not backing down.
You're really squeezing me now, Alice! I'll try to hold on to what I can. Your turn again!
